title: What can I do if the amount of power remaining in the battery is not displayed accurately?
answer:
1.         Try restarting your phone or back up your data and restore your phone to factory settings.

2.         Try updating your phone's operating system to the latest version.

3.         If the problem persists, replace the battery (if it can be removed) or take your phone and proof of purchase to an authorized Huawei service center to be tested.
